text: Jorgelina Julia Aranda (19 August 1942 - 10 January 2015) was an Argentine actress, model and singer. She was known for her role in Il Gaucho. Aranda was born in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Aranda died of cancer in Buenos Aries, aged 72.«Murió Jorgelina Aranda, una de las más famosas secretarias de Roberto Galán», date: 11 January 2015 published by Clarín (Buenos Aires). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Argentine models Category:Singers from Buenos Aires Category:Cancer deaths in Argentina Category:Actors from Buenos Aires
title: Jorgelina Aranda
